createCentripetalForce.name: createCentripetalForce
createCentripetalForce.description: Create a centripetal force that pulls bodies towards a center.

createCombinedForce.name: createCombinedForce
createCombinedForce.description: Create a combined force that is an additive combination of all the given forces.

createForce.name: createForce
createForce.description: Create a force that applies to all bodies using the provided higher order/lambda/arrow/anonymous function.

createGravity.name: createGravity
createGravity.description: Create a force that applies to all bodies.

createExplicitEulerSim.name: createExplicitEulerSim
createExplicitEulerSim.description: Create an explicit euler integrator to be used as the simulation function.

createLambdaSim.name: createLambdaSim
createLambdaSim.description: Create a simulate function (usually a numerical integrator) that is used to simulate the nbody system using the provided higher order/lambda/arrow/anonymous function.
params: (deltaT: number, prevState: State, currState: State) => State

createRungeKutta4Sim.name: createRungeKutta4Sim
createRungeKutta4Sim.description: Create a numerical integrator that uses the Runge-Kutta 4 method to simulate the nbody system.

createSemiImplicitEulerSim.name: createSemiImplicitEulerSim
createSemiImplicitEulerSim.description: Create a numerical integrator that uses the semi-implicit Euler method to simulate the nbody system.

createVelocityVerletSim.name: createVelocityVerletSim
createVelocityVerletSim.description: Create a numerical integrator that uses the velocity Verlet method to simulate the nbody system.

createState.name: createState
createState.description: Create a new state snapshot of the universe.

createBodyCenterTransformation.name: createBodyCenterTransformation
createBodyCenterTransformation.description: Create a frame of reference transformation that moves the origin to the center of ith both.

createCoMTransformation.name: createCoMTransformation
createCoMTransformation.description: Create a frame of reference transformation that moves the origin to the center of mass of the system.

createLambdaTransformation.name: createLambdaTransformation
createLambdaTransformation.description: Create a frame of reference transformation using a higher order/lambda/arrow/anonymous function.

createPinTransformation.name: createPinTransformation
createPinTransformation.description: Create a frame of reference transformation that pins the ith body to a specific axis.

createRotateTransformation.name: createRotateTransformation
createRotateTransformation.description: Create a frame of reference transformation that rotates the system around an axis by an angle.

createTimedRotateTransformation.name: createTimedRotateTransformation
createTimedRotateTransformation.description: Create a frame of reference transformation that rotates the system by 360 deg around an axis over a period of time.

getX.name: getX
getX.description: Get the x component of a vector.

getY.name: getY
getY.description: Get the y component of a vector.

getZ.name: getZ
getZ.description: Get the z component of a vector.

setX.name: setX
setX.description: Set the x component of a vector.

setY.name: setY
setY.description: Set the y component of a vector.

setZ.name: setZ
setZ.description: Set the z component of a vector.
